The determination of the moisture content within the polymeric films was carried out by the thermogravimetric analysis method. Simplistically, the films were incubated in a hot air oven that is maintained at 105–110 °C. The incubation of the films was continued until a constant weight of the films was obtained [ 95]. The weight of the polymeric films was recorded before and after the incubation. Herein, the films were heated by the process of convection.
